message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly useful for you, and I'm aiming to sell it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I know this product is worth significantly more than that.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
